item.title: Mapping the Distribution of Religious Beliefs in Singapore
item.author: timothy.lin@alumni.ubc.ca (Timothy Lin)
item.description: Inspired by my thesis, I have been playing around with mapping tools over the past few days. While the maps showing the distribution of migrant groups across the United States did not make it to the final copy of my paper I had fun toying around with the various mapping packages. In this post, I decided to apply what I have learnt and take a look at the spatial distribution of Singaporeâ€™s population.
